fragment: Matthew McConaughey stars in Interstellar as the main protagonist. The teaser trailer for Interstellar debuted December 13, 2013 and featured clips related to space exploration accompanied by a voiceover by Matthew McConaughey's character Cooper.

Anne Hathaway joins the cast of Interstellar alongside Matthew McConaughey. When Murph grows up into Jessica Chastain, a key member of Caine's NASA crew and a surrogate for the daughter that the elder Brand lost to the Endurance's mission.

Christopher Nolan directs Interstellar, bringing his unique vision to the film. I think really space exploration to me has always represented the most hopeful and optimistic endeavor that mankind has ever really engaged with.
Matt Damon joins the cast of Interstellar in a supporting role.
Hoyte van Hoytema serves as the director of photography for Interstellar.
Wally Pfister, known for his work with Christopher Nolan, is replaced by Hoyte van Hoytema as the director of photography for Interstellar.
Paul Franklin serves as the visual effects supervisor for Interstellar.
Kip Thorne, a renowned physicist, serves as a science advisor for Interstellar. Thorne collaborated with Franklin and a team of 30 people at Double Negative.
Hans Zimmer composes the score for Interstellar, including the iconic theme.
